code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:pt presents with increased mild malaise, mild chills and mild cough over 2 years. patient is a white male drummer aged 24 years. o:Height 187 cm, Weight 59.8 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 15, HEENT: WNL, Cough present during interview with sputum production, all lung fields, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Bronchitis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Guaifenesin - 600 mg by mouth daily, and ordered CBC, Pulse Oximetry, RSV Antigen.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination
